plays.text: Goal scored by BENOIT BRUNET assisted by Jamie Langenbrunner and Kirk Muller
Goal scored by Mike Modano assisted by Brenden Morrow and Jere Lehtinen
Penalty to Robyn Regehr 2 minutes for Roughing Brenden Morrow
Penalty to Pat Verbeek 2 minutes for Roughing Dean McAmmond
Penalty to JAMIE WRIGHT 2 minutes for High Sticking Jamie Langenbrunner
Penalty to Pat Verbeek 2 minutes for Boarding Denis Gauthier
Penalty to Mike Modano 2 minutes for Tripping Dean McAmmond
Penalty to Kirk Muller 2 minutes for Obstruction - Hooking Dean McAmmond
Penalty to Pat Verbeek 2 minutes for Unsportsmanlike Conduct Bob Boughner
Penalty to Bob Boughner 2 minutes for Unsportsmanlike Conduct Pat Verbeek
Penalty to Rob Niedermayer 2 minutes for Holding the Stick Richard Matvichuk
Goal scored by Pierre Turgeon assisted by Mike Modano and Jere Lehtinen
